DDL:
CREATE TABLE cleaned_weekly_sales (
    week_date_formatted varchar(25),
    week_date date,
    region varchar(13),
    platform varchar(7),
    segment varchar(7),
    customer_type varchar(8),
    transactions INT,
    sales INT,
    week_number varchar(2),
    month_number INT,
    calendar_year year,
    age_band varchar(12),
    demographic varchar(8),
    avg_transaction decimal(13,2)
);

CREATE TABLE weekly_sales (
    week_date varchar(7),
    region varchar(13),
    platform varchar(7),
    segment varchar(4),
    customer_type varchar(8),
    transactions INT,
    sales INT
);
